column4: hello everyone I am having major troubles with setting up a printer and cups has a message administrative tasks disabled. what can I do?
i don't know that driver but have you installed it?
my assumption was that since printers > administration gave me the option it was installed
If I could enable cups at localhost:631 I could fix it using cups and gimp-print

when i browse to localhost:631 cups administration page is there i did grep and the cupsd dameon is running however in the cups admin page there is a small red banner directing me to use the  system-> printer menu choices because administration privilidges have been turned off.
have you enabled a root user?
np i am checking cupsd.conf to look for settings thanks
sJaM ; thanks got it fixed one must use the correct port and ubuntu rocks works like a dream using the menu. This distro is sooooo cool
sJaM ; thanks for your suggestions guided me to the solution
actually 9100 is the port I have my jetdirect printer driver at 192.168.1.60 not 192.168.1.80 as I had put in the dialog did a ping and remembered the correct address.
